name: lambda-microservice-template
description: Template for microservice using lambda / typescript / serverless

scripts.build: rm -Rf dst && tsc && cd src && find . -name '*.json' -type f -exec cp {} ../dst/{} \; && cd ..
scripts.pack-local: rm -f dst.zip && cp package.json dst/package.json && (cp .npmrc dst/.npmrc || true) && cd dst && ln -s ../node_modules node_modules && npm ls && zip -r ../dst.zip . ** && cd ..
scripts.pack: rm -f dst.zip && cp package.json dst/package.json && (cp package-lock.json dst/ || true) && (cp .npmrc dst/.npmrc || true) && cd dst && npm install --cache=../.npm --production && npm ls && zip -r ../dst.zip . ** && cd ..
scripts.pretest: rm -Rf dst && tsc -p ./tsconfig.test.json && cd src && find . -name '*.json' -type f -exec cp {} ../dst/{} \; && cd .. && npm run dynamodb:cleanup && npm run dynamodb:setup
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run pack && serverless deploy

author: Kurt Lee
